comment.text: The "LdapAttributeMapping" translation key refers to the label for an attribute mapping component in a LDAP integration settings page. It is used to display a descriptive title for this setting, likely appearing as a header or section title within a dialog or settings panel.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'تعيين الميزات' while technically meaning 'attribute assignment/mapping', doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Attribute mapping' in a technical context. It implies a general assignment of features, whereas 'Attribute mapping' specifically refers to the process of associating attributes from one system to another.

The Lao translation "ການຖອດຄ່າສັດທະລັດ" (kan thot kha satthalat) literally translates to 'attribute decoding'. While 'decoding' might be conceptually related to mapping in some contexts, 'attribute mapping' generally refers to a direct correspondence or assignment, not a process of decoding. A more appropriate translation would capture the idea of correspondence or association.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ການຕິດຄ່າລັກສະນະ" (kan tit kha lak sane) which means 'attribute association' or "ການກຳນົດຄ່າສັດທະລັດ" (kan kamnot kha satthalat) which means 'attribute assignment'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Polish translation "Mapowanie atrybutów DOS" includes "DOS," which is likely an unnecessary and inaccurate addition. "DOS" refers to a specific operating system and doesn't belong in the translation of 'Attribute mapping'.

While "Mapare atribute" is understandable, it's not the most natural or precise translation of "Attribute mapping." It literally translates to "Mapping attributes." A more accurate and common translation would be "Asocierea atributelor" or "Corespondența atributelor".

The translation 'ගුණාංග සිතුවීම' while containing relevant words, doesn't fully capture the meaning of 'Attribute mapping'. 'Attribute mapping' implies a process or relationship, while 'ගුණාංග සිතුවීම' primarily means 'attribute thinking' or 'quality thinking'. A more suitable translation would emphasize the 'mapping' aspect, suggesting a relationship or correspondence.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translations like 'විශේෂතා ඇමිණුම' (Vishishtaama anum) which more closely represents 'attribute mapping' by focusing on the connection or association.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Мапирање Атрибута' is a literal transliteration of 'Attribute Mapping'. While understandable, a more natural Serbian (Cyrillic) translation would be 'Упоредба атрибута' or 'Додељивање атрибута'. 'Мапирање' is a borrowed word and sounds slightly awkward in this context.
